title: This $95 display adds Apple CarPlay functionality to any vehicle
content:
Macworld

Automotive technology may have jumped by leaps and bounds over the last several years, but that doesn’t mean it’s cost-effective to trade in an old car that’s working fine. Want a cheaper way to upgrade your existing ride? This foldable touchscreen display is a good alternative. And since it’s on sale right now for $65 off the MSRP, you can get one at an affordable price.

With a 6.8-inch touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto support, this little unit has everything you need to bring any older vehicle into the year 2024. You just install it to your dash or window (mounting brackets included) and connect it via an FM transmitter, Bluetooth, or an AUX jack. Then you’ll enjoy easy access to your apps and media.

And there’s just so many different things you can do with it. You can use Siri or Google Assistant to make calls, control navigation, and more completely hands-free. It’ll mirror movies from your phone, play music, and it’s even compatible with backup cameras to make parking easier than ever. And it’s widely compatible too, so it’ll work with just about anything that has four wheels.

Get the 6.8” foldable touchscreen car display for just $95.99 (reg. $159.99) for a limited time.
